entry.title: Survivors Emerge From Ukrainian Theater Bombed in Russian Airstrike
entry.content: Rescuers freed 130 people from the building and hundreds more remained trapped, as Russian forces continued shelling in Ukraine.

entry.title: Putin Vows to Press On With Ukraine Invasion at Moscow Rally
entry.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin defended the assault in a rare public appearance at a gathering to mark the eighth anniversary of Russia’s seizure of Crimea from Ukraine.

entry.title: Russian Oligarch Roman Abramovich Races to Outpace Western Sanctions
entry.content: The billionaire businessman with ties to Putin is trying to move chunks of his wealth out of the reach of an expanding dragnet. His trophy asset, London soccer club Chelsea, is on the block.

entry.title: Clandestine Finance System Helped Iran Withstand Sanctions Crush, Documents Show
entry.content: The system has helped Tehran resist the Biden administration’s pressure to rejoin the 2015 nuclear deal, buying it time to advance its nuclear program even while negotiations were under way.
